alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:59AM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 1000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, except 3 to 11 inches below 2000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon
